/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of beige and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and bushes, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, with its blend of natural and man-made elements.
